signals.reason: Recent 8‑minute candles show a clear upward bias: price moved from 208.746 to 209.338 (+0.28%). Bollinger Bands show price hugging the upper band, confirming bullish pressure. A bullish engulfing pattern at 17:44‑17:45 supports a short‑term continuation. All indicators align, giving a high‑confidence BUY signal.
